TBBS = #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM B_S_00101 B
ORDER BY B.PXH, B.ID
mapper.update: update B_S_00101 B set B.ZT = 0 , B.TBBS = 1
UPDATE B_S_00101 set ZT = 0 , TBBS = 1 WHERE ZJQDID IN (SELECT ID FROM B_S_001 B START WITH ID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR B.ID = B.FJDID)

MERGE INTO B_S_0010301 A USING B_S_00101 B ON (A.ZJQDID = B.ZJQDID AND A.JKLBH = B.JKLBH AND B.ZT = 1) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.BJYY = B.BJYY, A.BJYY_DW = B.BJYY_DW, A.ZJHYY = B.ZJHYY, A.ZJHYY_DW = B.ZJHYY_DW, A.WHSJ = SYSDATE WHERE A.ZJQDID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ZT = 1
